presentation.title: Computer Engineer
presentation.description: Developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences.
presentation.cv_description: Download my resume in PDF format

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Computer Engineering student, with a constant focus on deeply understanding every tool, process, and dynamic that influence my work. I stand out for maintaining a proactive attitude, learning from those around me and quickly adapting to new challenges. I value teamwork as a space to contribute, listen, and build effective solutions, always seeking that each project delivers a solid and well-executed result. My training is primarily oriented towards backend development with Java, Node.js, and Spring Boot, integrating SQL/NoSQL databases and applying good practices in architecture, optimization, and DevOps.

experience.title: Experience

projects.name: Freelancer Application
projects.description: Web platform designed to connect independent professionals with potential clients, facilitating the offering and hiring of specialized services.

projects.name: Online Store
projects.description: Complete e-commerce system for a local store, enhancing their digital presence and online shopping experience.

projects.name: Algorithm Optimization for Circuits
projects.description: Optimization project focused on improving the design and computational analysis of electrical circuits through efficient algorithms.

projects.name: Document Analysis System
projects.description: RAG system that processes and analyzes documents using AI, enabling the extraction of relevant information and generation of precise responses.

projects.name: Team Management Application
projects.description: Application to record and organize sports teams, simplifying tournament management and results presentation.

projects.name: ISOlytics - Audit and Compliance Software
projects.description: Comprehensive tool for companies to validate and manage their compliance with international standards such as ISO, ITIL, and other quality frameworks.

experience.conclusion: These experiences allowed me to apply theoretical knowledge in practical contexts, foster teamwork, and develop innovative solutions.

university.focus: Training in Computer Engineering with emphasis on backend development, databases, software architecture, and agile methodologies.

list.title: Freelancers Web Page
list.description: A web page for freelancers to offer their services and clients to hire them. (No responsive design yet).

list.title: ScoreBoard App
list.description: An application for recording and organizing equipment, designed to simplify the organization and presentation of results efficiently.

list.title: E-commerce
list.description: An e-commerce platform designed to facilitate the purchase and sale of products, offering an intuitive experience for users, with functionalities such as inventory management, product search, and an efficient purchase flow.

list.title: RAG System
list.description: A RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system that uses OpenAI AI together with vectorization techniques to process and analyze documents provided by the user. The system allows generating precise responses based on the information provided, integrating an interactive dashboard for document management, query monitoring, and results visualization, thus optimizing access to personalized and relevant knowledge.

list.title: ISOlytics
list.description: Audit and compliance software. Implementation of a tool for companies to validate their compliance with standards (ISO, ITIL, etc.).
